sentences.en: Beneath its purple pall , the face painted on the canvas could grow bestial , sodden, and unclean.
sentences.cn: 在这块紫色的棺衣下, 画布上的脸变得毫无人性、污秽 、 不洁.

sentences.en: Brangwen went about at his work, heavy , his heart heavy as the sodden earth.
sentences.cn: 布兰温忙着干活, 心情宛如浸湿的土地一样十分沉重.

sentences.en: Child mouth both sides is sodden, how to make gift quickly better?
sentences.cn: 孩子嘴两边烂, 怎样做才能快点好起来?

sentences.en: He lay back with his eyes shut, still sodden in the atmosphere of the dream.
sentences.cn: 他闭上眼睛躺着, 仍浸沉在梦境中的气氛里.

sentences.en: Highland roads often collapse when typhoon - sodden land is shaken.
sentences.cn: 饱受台风浸润的山区道路常因震动而崩塌.

sentences.en: His clothes were sodden with rain.
sentences.cn: 他的衣服因雨水而湿透了.

sentences.en: His grey jersey and trousers were sodden with the rain.
sentences.cn: 他的灰色针织毛衫和长裤全都被雨水淋透了。

sentences.en: His sodden trousers were clinging to his shins and his shoes squelched.
sentences.cn: 他湿透的裤子紧贴小腿，鞋子吧唧作响。

sentences.en: His sodden trousers were clinging to his shins.
sentences.cn: 湿淋淋的裤子紧紧粘在他小腿上。

sentences.en: Long lines of soldiers were passing, dust covered , sodden with weariness.
sentences.cn: 一队队满身尘土 、 精疲力竭的士兵从那里经过.

sentences.en: My shirt was sodden with sweat.
sentences.cn: 我的衬衫被汗水湿透了.

sentences.en: The cardboard was sodden and fell apart in his hands.
sentences.cn: 纸板潮得都发酥了,手一捏就碎.

sentences.en: The porter put our scruffy rain-sodden luggage on a trolley.
sentences.cn: 搬运工把我们那些被雨水浸透的脏兮兮的行李放上了手推车。

sentences.en: The sodden eye had kept something of the loveliness of their blue.
sentences.cn: 呆滞的眼睛依稀剩有一点悦目的蓝色.

sentences.en: We stripped off our sodden clothes.
sentences.cn: 我们扒下了湿透的衣服。

words.tran_cn: 浸透的；浑身湿透的；浸过酒的

trans.tran_cn: 浸透的，无表情的，呆头呆脑的
